description: This scholarship is awarded to honor the late Doug Duke, also known as the guru of speech and debate in Oklahoma, who taught for 38 years at UCO. Duke created a legacy of debate teams that brought home enough trophies to fill a room, including two national championships. This scholarship is provided for meeting the immediate needs of debaters. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled full-time Continuing student in fall semester that scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
